22
23 void HP1_DCBlock::set_cutoff(double frequency)
24 {
25 R = 1 - (constants::TWO_PI * frequency / sample_rate);
26 }
27
28 double HP1_DCBlock::process(double x)
29 {
30 const double y = x - xz1 + R * yz1;
31
32 xz1 = x;
33 yz1 = y;
34
35 return y;
36 }
